name: Wind Speed Potential at 50m (m/s)
description: Average wind speed at 50 meters of altitude in meters per second (m/s).

body.sldValue: <RasterSymbolizer> +   <ChannelSelection>+    <GrayChannel>+    <SourceChannelName>b1</SourceChannelName>+    </GrayChannel>+ </ChannelSelection>+    <ColorMap type="ramp" extended="false" > +  <ColorMapEntry color="#ffffd9" quantity="0"  opacity="0" /> +  <ColorMapEntry color="#edf8b1" quantity="1"  /> +    <ColorMapEntry color="#c7e9b4" quantity="3"  /> +  <ColorMapEntry color="#41b6c4" quantity="6"  /> +    <ColorMapEntry color="#225ea8" quantity="10"  /> +    <ColorMapEntry color="#0c2c84" quantity="243.71627807617188"  /> +  </ColorMap> +  </RasterSymbolizer>

config.url: https://api.resourcewatch.org/v1/query/baeaa2b1-96da-473e-86ea-2b6a9967dab9?sql=select st_summarystats(rast, 'b1', false) as x from 'projects/resource-watch-gee/ene_030_globalwindatlas' where ST_INTERSECTS(ST_SetSRID(ST_GeomFromGeoJSON('{"type":"Point","coordinates":[{{lng}},{{lat}}]}'),4326),the_geom)
